alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Thomas; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 7:27PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Cherry, eastern Hooker and northwestern Thomas Counties through 815 PM CDT/715 PM MDT/... At 726 PM CDT/626 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Thedford to 6 miles south of Mullen. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Very heavy rainfall, winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Very heavy rainfall, wGusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mullen, Thedford, Seneca, Norway, Highway 97 crossing the Dismal River and Kelso. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 178 and 215. Highway 97 between mile markers 52 and 70. Highway 83 between mile markers 146 and 159. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Thomas; Western Cherry
